body: I saw this and other his works on other website in English. This artist is really amazing and he is so young. Funny part he is from 1995 like me lol, but I'm from Feb and he is from Dec. 22 years old artist make something amazing like that with top tier art, it's just beautiful. Japanese people really are talented in drawing. I hope it's gonna sell good in Japan and he is gonna get better ans draw for us for so long. Wish u luck Maki Tatsuki !
